I'm Tyler, a

I specialize in Web Design and Development

My Projects

What I Do

I create visually appealing websites, UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications.

Interaction

Working in the car business i was blessed enough to learn one of the most important skills for any job, Communication. I spent most of my day helping and interacting with complete strangers. This helped me build interpersonal skills i may have never learned, if it wasn't for this experience.

Visual Design

The design process is important because it can either grab your viewers attention or run them away very fast. I always try to stick to the design principles. What's the purpose of the Website, Simplicity, Navigation, Patterned Reading, Visual Hierarchy, Layout, Content, and loading time.

UI/UX

Things like buttons, icons, content, images, and screen sizes need to be carefully reviewed. The User Experience will also be carefully looked at. Typography, Color Theory, and design patterns will help with the end-user's interaction with the company, its services, and its products.

Development

This is where i have the most fun. Developers like myself turn your ideas into reality. I specialize in Front-End Development. I will code your ideas using today's latest technologies. I will carefully build your site to look great on desktops, laptops, tablets, and smart phones.

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do...

Passionate About The Learning Process

I am a Front-End Web Developer From Lakeland, Florida who is passionate about the web.

When i started my working career in 2005, i updated and maintained 4 different websites for a Car Dealership for 7 years. The companies main website was a very basic design using HTML and CSS.

After i left that job i got a apprenticeship in the printing industry where became a successful Graphic Artist in the world of Bindery. I would create books, magazines, and brochures on various types of bindery equipment.

Read More

Technologies i work with

My Design Process

All of my Websites and designs are based off of practiced process to get the end result i am looking for.

1

Lets talk about the Project

What your are looking to accomplish with your website, and some of the things you want to include. I want to know more about the business and its products.

2

Concept

Lets get a concept together. I would use something like Figma or Balsamiq to come up with a prototype of the layout and content placement.

3

UI/UX Planning

Here We will carefully discuss and plan where certain parts of the page will be placed. This is where it will get fun. We will start picking colors and styles for the website.

4

Interaction

We will constantly be in touch and bouncing ideas off of each other. It is my job to make sure that this experience is pleasant and impactful.
